properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 11:57AM CST until February 7 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts
to 35 kt expected. For the first Small Craft Advisory, west
winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt. For the second Small
Craft Advisory, northwest winds 20 knots with gusts to 25 knots.

* WHERE...Southern Mobile Bay and Mississippi Sound.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM
CST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM CST this
evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 AM to 9 AM CST
Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY
